author: fanf
msg: Fix the handling of EOF when reading from a pipe bucket (in this context
I think we want to return APR_SUCCESS rather than APR_EOF, and we don't
want to return early), and remove the pointless ap_bucket_pipe structure
which also kills a little memory leak.

author: fanf
msg: fix the return value from the read function

author: rbb
msg: Wrap the UNSPLICE macro for use with bucket brigades.  This allows buckets
to be removed from a brigade

author: dougm
msg: if a filter fumbles and does not send anything downstream, data == NULL == SEGV
